entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending before morning then cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
